Isaac.title: Isaac
content: I am Isaac and I am `age`22102008` years old. Some things I like include maths, coding, and music. This is my webpage that I programmed.

`img`data:image/png;base64,` This image is unique because you will see "Image 1" if it is on a white background, but "Image 2" if it is on a black background. I explored this type of image and got it to work with other colours.
